publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-646 Patricia Ferguson: John Paul Academy 25th Anniversaryâ€”That the Parliament notes that 2007 marks the 25th anniversary of John Paul Academy in Maryhill; further notes the success that this school has achieved over the last 25 years, and congratulates the staff, pupils and parents on making the school such a valued part of the community.
S3M-646 John Paul Academy 25th Anniversary (lodged on 16 October 2007) Michael McMahon*
S3M-646 John Paul Academy 25th Anniversary (lodged on 16 October 2007) Bob Doris*
